mapper.sql: hash, total, `decimal`, symbol, asset, block_number, contract, token_standard, token_action, `from`, `to`
mapper.select: select distinct crtc.contract, crtc.name,crtc.symbol,(SELECT count(distinct `to`) FROM c_rt_contract newcrtc WHERE newcrtc.contract = crtc.contract) holders from c_rt_contract crtc limit #{offset},#{limit}

select distinct crtc.contract, crtc.name, crtc.symbol, "address" as type from c_rt_contract crtc
name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
and symbol LIKE concat(concat('%',#{symbol}),'%')

select crtc.`hash`, crtc.`from` as tfrom, crtc.`to` as tto, conv(crtc.total/(power(10,crtc.`decimal`)),16,10) quantity, crtc.total, crtc.`decimal`,brb.t FROM c_rt_contract crtc LEFT JOIN b_rt_block brb ON brb.number = conv(crtc.block_number,16,10) where token_action = "transfer" and contract =#{contract} limit #{offset},#{limit}
select contract from c_rt_contract where contract =#{contract} and token_action="create"
select count(0) FROM c_rt_contract where contract =#{contract} and token_action = "transfer"

select (SELECT total FROM c_rt_contract where contract =#{contract} AND token_action= "create") total, (select count(DISTINCT `from`) from ( (SELECT distinct `from` FROM c_rt_contract where contract =#{contract} UNION ALL SELECT distinct `to` FROM c_rt_contract where contract =#{contract})) fromAndTo) holders, (SELECT count(`hash`) FROM c_rt_contract WHERE contract =#{contract} AND token_action= "transfer" ) transfers, contract,`decimal`, name, symbol FROM c_rt_contract where contract =#{contract} AND token_action= "create"
select contract,`decimal` FROM c_rt_contract where `name` =#{name} ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1,1
mapper.update: update c_rt_contract set total = #{total} where token_action = #{tokenAction} and contract = #{contract}
